parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

addresses.description: Holds unstructured address information, e.g. Contact Person. Building, Floor, Apartment, Street Number, Street Name, Town, Area, Code

street.description: The first line of the base address of a customer or prospect

addressCity.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer

postCode.description: The postal code of the customer or prospect

country.description: The country component of the base address of a customer

addressDetail.description: Holds unstructured address information, e.g. Contact Person. Building, Floor, Apartment, Street Number, Street Name, Town, Area, Code

contactDetails.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

legalHolderName.description: Name of the account holder in the Legal Document

legalIssueDate.description: Date of Issue of the legal document

legalExpiredDate.description: Expiry date of the legal document submitted as proof

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

customerMnemonic.description: Specifies an alternative easy means of referencing the Customer

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

statusName.description: An institution-defined high level description or segmentation of the customer

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

residenceId.description: The identifier of the country of residence of a customer

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

accountOfficerName.description: Name of the Account/Relationship Officer attached to the Customer

industryId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the industry in which the customer is trading, operating or is associated with

sectorId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the type of customer

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

birthIncorpDate.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

targetName.description: Describes the target in an abbreviated form which can be used for reporting when space is limited.This can be expanded to allow the User to enter a short description of the Target code in various languages.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
